lyrics:
(Hey!, hey!, hey!)
La, la, la
(Hey!, hey!, hey!)

(Selena)
You come from here
I come from there

(DEMI)
You rock out in your room
I rock a world premiere

(Selena)
We're more alike
Than anybody could ever tell

(DEMI)
Friday we're cool
Monday we're freaks
(Selena)
Sometimes we're cool
Sometimes we can't even speak

(DEMI)
But we kick it up
And let loose in lol

(Selena)
It might seem cliche
For me to wanna say
That you're not alone

(DEMI)
And you can call me uncool
But it's a simple fact
I got your back

(Demi and selena)
'Cause we're one and the same
We're anything but ordinary
One and the same
I think we're almost legendary
You and me the perfect team
Chasing down the dream
We're one and the same

La, la, la

(DEMI)
I'm kinda like you
Your kinda like me
(Selena)
We right the same song
In a different key

(Demi and selena)
It's got a rhythm
You and me can get along

(Selena)
And it may seem cliche
For me to wanna say
That you're not alone
(Here I go again)
(DEMI)
And you can call me uncool
But I still got your back

(Demi and selena)
'Cause we're one and the same
We're anything but ordinary
One and the same
I think we're almost legendary
You and me the perfect team
Chasing down the dream
We're one and the same

'Cause we're one and the same
We're anything but ordinary
One and the same
We're something more than momentary
'Cause we're one
'Cause we're one
We're anything but ordinary
You and me the perfect team
Chasing down the dream

You and me the perfect team
Shaking up the scene
We're one and the same

La, la, la
(Hey!, hey!, hey!)
